class.name: AuthorizationContextImpl
class.meta: Represents a set of individual Permissions defined for a specific business context; for example, we may befine a 'PERMS_PARTY' permission group to define the Permissions for Creating/Reading/Updating/Deleting Party objects.

property.name: name
property.meta: Unique short-hard name for this AuthorizationContext

property.name: description
property.meta: Human readable description of this AuthorizationContext

property.name: sortOrder
property.meta: Used to define a default order for AuthorizationContexts when displayed outside the context of a specific Role

list.name: permissionBits
list.meta: The list of permissions that this AuthorizationContext defines

property.name: name
property.meta: short-hand name for this Permission (e.g.: READ)

property.name: description
property.meta: Human readable description of this Permission

property.name: sortOrder
property.meta: used to specify a display ordering of the bits in the context of a AuthorizationContext
